page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content: My Dad has a small number of fields.In these he grows hay.He cuts it late in the summer then visits farmers to sell it to them.If they want to buy it he delivers it to them.Because this only takes a small part of his time and does not make a lot of money he also works on Ernie Diamonds farm.He does all sorts of things,driving tractors,looking after animals,mending hedges and fences and planting crops. When it is harvest time he has to get up before I am awake and he gets home after I have gone to sleep.He works very hard. By Lorraine Bishop.
